title: Captioning Contacts
body:
This contact information is intended to be used only for the reporting of closed captioning issues. If you would like to contact us about something other than closed captioning, please use WBAL-TV contact information found here. 

For NON-IMMEDIATE CLOSED CAPTIONING CONCERNS, please contact:Name: Sharon McNicholasPhone: (410) 338-6423Fax: (410) 554-5214Address: 3800 Hooper Avenue, Baltimore, Maryland 21211Email: smcnicholas@
